item.title: APSB24-35: Security update available for Adobe Premiere Pro
item.description:
Adobe has released security updates for Adobe Premiere Pro. These updates resolve critical vulnerabilities that could lead to arbitrary code execution.
Products: Adobe Premiere Pro 2024, Adobe Premiere Pro 2023 Severity: Critical
View full advisory: https://helpx.adobe.com/security/products/premiere_pro/apsb24-35.html
item.author: Adobe Security Team
